tool_description: Access e-sports data. Find League of Legends Matches and corresponding game/team/player stats.
name: API-pandascore
title: API-pandascore

api_list.name: Matches Show
api_list.description: Show singular match with data associated teams, games and individual player per game stats.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-pandascore.p.rapidapi.com/matches/650"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-pandascore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://api-pandascore.p.rapidapi.com/matches/{match_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-pandascore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Matches Index
api_list.description: List of 10 most recently played LeagueOfLegends matches
